thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Local Black Stars to train on WAFA pitch ahead of Ivory Coast CHAN qualifier
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Local Black Stars to train on WAFA pitch ahead of Ivory Coast CHAN qualifier

title: EXCLUSIVE: Local Black Stars to train on WAFA pitch ahead of Ivory Coast CHAN qualifier
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 11:25 CET EXCLUSIVE: Local Black Stars to train on WAFA pitch ahead of Ivory Coast CHAN qualifier - www.ghanasoccernet.com Local Black Stars 
The Local Black Stars will train on the artificial pitch at WAFA SC to prepare for their 2016 CHAN return leg qualifier against Ivory Coast in Abidjan, GHANASoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
The home-based national are expecting in Accra this weekend where they will head to Sogakope to put the finishing touches to their preparations at the renowned soccer academy. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
